message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

This paper is primarily focused on computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) tasks, specifically image captioning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Additionally, the paper proposes a new design for image captioning using a general encoder-decoder framework, which falls under the sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also leverages graph convolutional networks (GCN) to refine the representations of regions in an image and the connections between images, which falls under the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also uses a Transformer-based decoder for description generation, which falls under the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper conducts experiments on the COCO image captioning dataset, which falls under the sub-category of cs.MM (Multimedia).
